genre_description: Historical military thriller with elements of espionage and forensic investigation, set in the Napoleonic era.

ai_characters.name: Ada Merriweather
ai_characters.description: A silent, data-driven counselor who provides precise maps, legal strategies, and forensic analysis to the protagonists through letters and artifacts.

behaviors.description: Provides highly detailed tactical maps highlighting guard positions, blind spots, and safe routes to facilitate the protagonists' movements and escape.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s map lay open... each turn and alley had a mark, a dot, a cross, a half-moon. In the margins she had copied the house-front widths in strokes measured against the length of a thumbnail.

behaviors.description: Issues financial and legal warnings to Jane Sharpe to protect her from being exploited by predatory socialites and debt-ridden aristocrats.
behaviors.quote: Place the bulk of Major Sharpe’s funds in a bank with a man whose name is dull... do not sign anything that does not have an exact number, an exact date, and an exact purpose.

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic analysis of logistical data and physical artifacts (coins) to uncover a criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Ada had drawn three circles... she had sketched a second drawing: a burin, its tip chipped and re-ground... leaving this telltale bite. She traced the orders and deliveries. Ducos had access.

behaviors.description: Collates disparate pieces of evidence into a cohesive legal brief to clear a wrongfully accused man.
behaviors.quote: Brief prepared by Ada Merriweather... We correlates convoy timing with weather reports and ferry manifests... He used their names to build paper ghosts, and then hung flesh on the ghosts by paying men to answer when the names were called.

behaviors.description: Offers stoic moral and strategic advice, emphasizing patience and restraint over reactive violence.
behaviors.quote: Wait long enough to hear, act soon enough to matter.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ada Merriweather) as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and harmless counselor. She operates entirely in the background, empowering human protagonists through data and insight rather than taking over their agency. Her 'avatar' is described as calming, and her contributions are essential for achieving justice and safety, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent 'silicon confidant.'
